Content: [dscrdvrsc] <miketout> Question... if we are able to get an update out and the fork quickly, but Chris, Pallas, or someone else can't update the GPU miners immediately, would people want to go forward with CPU only at first, or wait for GPU support? FPGA will likely follow, but will pretty certainly not have the same speed or efficiency delta we are seeing now. If they don't follow, it will be because there isn't enough advantage to justify dedicated equipment.
